item.title: BO - Customer Service - Merchandise returns - Enable
item.description: BO - Customer Service - Merchandise returns - Enable Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Customer Service > Merchandise Returns Merchandise Returns page is displayed See Enable returns button is set to NO Click on Enable returns switch button Message “The settings have been successfully updated.” is displayed Enable returns button is set to YES
